channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server

item.title: CVE-2021-36207|2024-09-17T00:11:33.212Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances improper privilege management in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS servers versions 10 and 11 could allow an authenticated user to elevate their privileges to administrator.
